top_comments.comment: Visit https://simplisafe.com/modustrial to learn more and to get at least 30% off your SimpliSafe security system!

Before you even mentioned the attachment for the slow close rails I was thinking "man, push-to-open drawers would be slick". 

That gets my vote.

comments_since_last_sample.body: Best wishes pretty much a filler video dude. I would have waited another week or a month for an actual worthwhile video.
Matte black handles! The push to open and close I feel would be extremely frustrating after a while, and get older quick!
Matt black pulls! It will give the kitchen even more class.
We'll be able to see how good simplisafe is when the Ukrainian mafia comes back for their nightclub....
